seg-source.mrk: Working in the Chart

target.mrk: 使用圖表

trans-unit.source: Learn how to work directly in the chart.

seg-source.mrk: Learn how to work directly in the chart.

target.mrk: 瞭解如何直接使用圖表。

trans-unit.source: Enable the display of non-working times, work center utilization, relationships, and constraints in the chart settings (<sap-icon-font><sap-icon-font-size/><sap-icon-font-color/><sap-icon-background-color/><sap-icon-font-character></sap-icon-font-character><sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font>).

seg-source.mrk: Enable the display of non-working times, work center utilization, relationships, and constraints in the chart settings (<sap-icon-font><sap-icon-font-size/><sap-icon-font-color/><sap-icon-background-color/><sap-icon-font-character></sap-icon-font-character><sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font>).

target.mrk: 在圖表設定 (<sap-icon-font><sap-icon-font-size/><sap-icon-font-color/><sap-icon-background-color/><sap-icon-font-character></sap-icon-font-character><sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font>) 中啟用非工作時間、工作中心利用情況、關係和限制條件顯示。

trans-unit.source: To zoom in (or zoom out) in the timeline at the cursor position, press and hold <keys><key>CTRL</key><key>SHIFT</key></keys>, then scroll up or down.

seg-source.mrk: To zoom in (or zoom out) in the timeline at the cursor position, press and hold <keys><key>CTRL</key><key>SHIFT</key></keys>, then scroll up or down.

target.mrk: 若要在游標位置放大 (縮小) 時間表，請按住 <keys><key>CTRL</key><key>SHIFT</key></keys> 然後向上或向下捲動。

trans-unit.source: Drag and Drop Orders and Operations

seg-source.mrk: Drag and Drop Orders and Operations

target.mrk: 拖放訂單和作業

trans-unit.source: You can change the start date and time of maintenance orders and order operations by dragging and dropping them one at a time to the desired date in the chart.

seg-source.mrk: You can change the start date and time of maintenance orders and order operations by dragging and dropping them one at a time to the desired date in the chart.

target.mrk: 您可在圖表中一次將一個訂單作業拖曳至所需日期，更改維護單和訂單作業的開始日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: If you drag and drop a maintenance order, any included due or dispatched operations are moved as well and any existing constraints on the operation dates are removed. If you drag and drop an operation bar, the app sets a new date constraint for the start date of the operation.

seg-source.mrk: If you drag and drop a maintenance order, any included due or dispatched operations are moved as well and any existing constraints on the operation dates are removed.
If you drag and drop an operation bar, the app sets a new date constraint for the start date of the operation.

target.mrk: 若拖放維護單，則維護單中的到期或已發派訂單作業也會一同移動，且會移除作業日期上的現有限制條件。
若拖放作業列，則應用程式會設定作業開始日期的新日期限制條件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref keyref="loioceff91f8e43d444fb242414d725e4fd9"/> in the product assistance.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see <xref keyref="loioceff91f8e43d444fb242414d725e4fd9"/> in the product assistance.

target.mrk: 如需更多資訊，請參閱 Product Assistance 中的 <xref keyref="loioceff91f8e43d444fb242414d725e4fd9"/>。

seg-source.mrk: Change Operations

target.mrk: 更改作業

trans-unit.source: To change order operations, for example, by changing the performing work center, dispatching the operations, or removing any date constraints, you can either use the toolbar buttons or the context menu for an operation bar in the chart.

seg-source.mrk: To change order operations, for example, by changing the performing work center, dispatching the operations, or removing any date constraints, you can either use the toolbar buttons or the context menu for an operation bar in the chart.

target.mrk: 若要更改訂單作業 (例如透過更改執行工作中心、發派作業或移除日期限制條件)，您可在圖表中使用工具列按鈕或作業列的內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: Using the toolbar buttons, you can change multiple operations at once. With this option, you must select the operations by marking the checkbox in the table.

seg-source.mrk: Using the toolbar buttons, you can change multiple operations at once.
With this option, you must select the operations by marking the checkbox in the table.

target.mrk: 透過工具列按鈕，您一次可更改多個作業。
若使用此選項，您必須透過勾選表格中的核取方塊以選擇作業。

trans-unit.source: Using the context menu, you can change one operation at a time. With this option, you don't need to mark the checkbox, just right-click the operation in the chart.

seg-source.mrk: Using the context menu, you can change one operation at a time.
With this option, you don't need to mark the checkbox, just right-click the operation in the chart.

target.mrk: 透過內容功能表，您一次可更改一個作業。
若使用此選項，您不需勾選核取方塊，僅需在圖表中的作業按一下右鍵。

seg-source.mrk: Work with Relationships

target.mrk: 使用關係

trans-unit.source: You can create and delete relationships between order operations and add offsets between related operations.

seg-source.mrk: You can create and delete relationships between order operations and add offsets between related operations.

target.mrk: 您可建立與刪除訂單作業之間的關係，並在相關作業之間新增調整。

trans-unit.source: To create a relationship between two order operations, proceed as follows:

seg-source.mrk: To create a relationship between two order operations, proceed as follows:

target.mrk: 若要在兩個訂單作業之間建立關係，請依照下列步驟進行：

trans-unit.source: Select an operation bar and then one of the connection points at the beginning or end of the bar, depending on the type of relationship that you want to create.

seg-source.mrk: Select an operation bar and then one of the connection points at the beginning or end of the bar, depending on the type of relationship that you want to create.

target.mrk: 根據要建立的關係類型，選擇作業列和其開頭或結尾的其中一個連接點。

trans-unit.source: Draw a line to the relevant connection point of the operation that you want to relate to the selected one. If both operations are in the same maintenance order and the related operation does not have a <uicontrol>Must start on</uicontrol> constraint set, the start date of the related operation is adjusted automatically.

seg-source.mrk: Draw a line to the relevant connection point of the operation that you want to relate to the selected one.

If both operations are in the same maintenance order and the related operation does not have a <uicontrol>Must start on</uicontrol> constraint set, the start date of the related operation is adjusted automatically.

target.mrk: 在要與所選作業連接點產生關聯的作業相關連接點繪製一條線。
若兩個作業的維護單相同且相關作業未設定 <uicontrol>[必須開始日期]</uicontrol> 限制條件，便會自動調整相關作業的開始日期。

trans-unit.source: To delete a relationship or to add, edit, or delete an offset for a relationship, right-click the relationship in the chart and select the relevant entry from the context menu. Note that the context menu is only available for explicit relationships.

seg-source.mrk: To delete a relationship or to add, edit, or delete an offset for a relationship, right-click the relationship in the chart and select the relevant entry from the context menu.
Note that the context menu is only available for explicit relationships.

target.mrk: 若要刪除關係，或針對關係新增、編輯或刪除調整，請在圖表中的關係按一下右鍵，並從內容功能表中選擇相關輸入項。
請注意，內容功能表僅可用於明確關係。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref keyref="loio2a1efcc19a194d4392ea377aeab60c08"/> in the product assistance.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see <xref keyref="loio2a1efcc19a194d4392ea377aeab60c08"/> in the product assistance.

target.mrk: 如需更多資訊，請參閱 Product Assistance 中的 <xref keyref="loio2a1efcc19a194d4392ea377aeab60c08"/>。
